customProperties.armorEffects: Your proficiency bonus is added to damage rolls anytime you cast a spell of 1st or higher level that deals fire damage (once per cast).
customProperties.weaponEffects: While wielding the weapon, you can cast Searing Smite using this weapon without requiring concentration a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus per Long Rest. Any attack made by this weapon is treated as if the you and the target are in sunlight.
customProperties.additionalEffects: Any magical effect that requires "dawn" can be circumvented at midnight by holding that item to any item made of Helios.

entries.name: Properties
entries: Armor Effects: Your proficiency bonus is added to damage rolls anytime you cast a spell of 1st or higher level that deals fire damage (once per cast).

Weapon Effects: While wielding the weapon, you can cast {@spell Searing Smite} using this weapon without requiring concentration a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus per Long Rest. Any attack made by this weapon is treated as if the you and the target are in sunlight.
Additional Effects: Any magical effect that requires "dawn" can be circumvented at midnight by holding that item to any item made of Helios.
